summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Proposal Builder app. Backend APIs are fully functional (12/12 tests passed) including AI proposal generation with GPT-5.2. However, critical frontend-backend integration issues prevent data loading, making the app unusable for end users.

integration_issues.issue: Dashboard shows 'Loading dashboard...' indefinitely and never loads stats or proposals data
Clause Library shows 'Loading clauses...' indefinitely and never loads clause data
Frontend cannot successfully fetch data from backend APIs despite backend working perfectly

action_item_for_main_agent: CRITICAL: Fix frontend-backend API integration. Backend APIs work perfectly but frontend cannot load data. Check: 1) API URL configuration in frontend, 2) CORS settings, 3) Network connectivity between frontend and backend, 4) Async/await error handling in frontend API calls. The app is currently unusable due to infinite loading states on all data-dependent pages.
